name: A100P
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 47th gamejam!
Gamejam theme : Stuck in a loop

Poor Stanley the fixer bot is stuck in a loop aboard the A100P PLANET-CRACKER Starship .
Day in, day out, the same maintenance chores each day.

Perhaps you can change something about that?

Whilst observing Stanley, you’ll notice that certain objects can be picked up and moved by holding your left mouse button.

Use these to try and affect Stanley by triggering emotions and opening new rooms.

Have fun!

Created by:

  • @psibuck - robot navigation work and camera code, gameplay code
  • @itsisaac - 2D & 3D art asset creation, room building, animation
  • @lachezar-hubanov - gameplay code, room building, assistant lighter & general team support
  • @peterfsat - for shading, lighting and scripting, Github issues expert
